archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: Stock Count (Container); DB Schenker SAP --> Vestas SAP
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation:
Schenker is posting goods receipt. This information is interfaced to Vestas using the IDoc MBGMCR02 --> Schenker makes a stock count on the container “Storage location” 7###. The difference list is sent to Vestas​ Services GmbH. Vestas Services GmbH approves the list and informs Schenker to post the changes.​ --> The material document created by this posting is interfaced to Vestas by the same interface as sends ​other stock counts.
Link to Documentation; https://vestas.sharepoint.com/:p:/r/sites/OneTool-T153PLrollout/Shared%20Documents/T15%203PL%20rollout/00%20Requirements%20and%20Process/Vestas%20-%20DB%20Schenker%20Interface.pptx?d=w8ae74256aee84e64a3c4764fa3b4d8bb&csf=1&web=1&e=PhplWf
